entry.title: Fee-Based Spam Prevention For Lightning
entry.summary: The updated paper now includes the numerical example previously discussed, which is aimed at enhancing understanding of the subject matter. This addition promises to provide a clearer insight into the methodologies and results outlined in the document. To facilitate better readability and comprehension, the tables within the paper have been reformatted. Interested readers can access the updated version of the paper for a more detailed look at the numerical examples and improved table formatting by visiting [the GitHub repository](https://github.com/JohnLaw2/ln-spam-prevention). This update underscores the author's commitment to providing thorough and accessible resources for those interested in spam prevention techniques.
